title: The Wind River Kid
description: You either worked for Cadmus Rindo and liked it, or you owed him money and you hated him. Old Cadmus owned the town of Rindo's Springs and everyone in it - until the day he picked a nameless drunk out of the jail and set him up as sheriff. The nameless drunk turned out to be a deadly gunslinger called the Wind River Kid, and old man Rindo found he had a tiger by the tail!
author: Will  Cook
